name: Hyperpigmentation
description: $HYPER is the revenue-first utility layer built on Solana, born from the “dot on the cheek” that marked the viral hyperpigmentation meme. We’ve taken that spark of meme culture and built real infrastructure behind it: HyperTek is our plug-and-play toolkit for on-chain communities to launch viral content, run on-chain games, manage liquidity, and reward activity. Everything is fully on-chain, transparent, and community-owned, ensuring we create lasting impact.
